verses.roman:
sustha hañā prabhu kare aṅga-kaṇḍūyana
prabhu-saṅge cale, nāhi chāḍe dhenu-gaṇa

synonyms: sustha hañā—becoming patient; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kare—does; aṅga—of the body; kaṇḍūyana—scratching; prabhu-saṅge—with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; cale—go; nāhi chāḍe—do not give up; dhenu-gaṇa—all the cows.
translation: Becoming pacified, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu began to caress the cows, and the cows, being unable to give up His company, went with Him.
